hero.title: Revolutionizing Agriculture with Smart Technology
hero.subtitle: Empowering Farmers for a Better Tomorrow
hero.description: Connect, trade, and grow with our comprehensive platform designed for the modern agricultural community. Access AI-powered insights, real-time market data, and expert advice to maximize your farm's potential.

features.title: Our Key Features
features.description: Discover the powerful tools and services that make farming smarter, easier, and more profitable.

aiAdvisory.title: AI-Powered Advisory
aiAdvisory.description: Get personalized farming recommendations and insights powered by advanced artificial intelligence.

pestDetection.title: Smart Pest Detection
pestDetection.description: Early detection and management of crop pests using cutting-edge technology and image analysis.

marketIntelligence.title: Market Intelligence
marketIntelligence.description: Access real-time market trends, price predictions, and trading opportunities to optimize your sales.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Ensure premium quality of your produce with our testing, certification, and grading services.

aiFeatures.title: AI-Powered Solutions
aiFeatures.description: Leverage the power of artificial intelligence to transform your farming operations and decision-making.

multilingualChat.title: Multilingual AI Chat
multilingualChat.description: Get instant answers in your preferred language

voiceCommands.title: Voice Commands
voiceCommands.description: Control your app with simple voice commands

quickAccess.title: Quick Access
quickAccess.description: Get started with these essential features
